thread.title: Customer in rural village
thread.title_full: tyresonthedrive.com reviewed by Customer in rural village

author: Customer in rural village
title: Customer in rural village
text:
Did what was asked for - changed all my tyres for new ones in a timely and convenient manner. And at a price cheaper than my dealership.
I was emailed that they would arrive 11.15-13.15h and they arrived nearly 2h early. Fortunately, I was not far away and they waited for me.
